bannedStatus.description: Status message when user/streamer is banned
bannedStatus.message: This video cannot be captured, because its author is banned.

bannedStatusTitle.description: Status title when user/streamer is banned

blockedStatus.description: Status message when stream is blocked by host
blockedStatus.message: This stream cannot be captured, because its streamer requested to opt-out of taking shots.

blockedStatusTitle.description: Status title when stream is blocked by host

confirmBetaProgram.description: Confirmation alert message that will be shown when a user select to join Beta Program
confirmBetaProgram.message: Are you sure you want to use Oddshot Beta?

cooldownStatus.description: Status message when stream is cooldown
cooldownStatus.message: Please wait before you take shot again.

cooldownStatusTitle.description: Status title when stream is cooldown

downloadDesktopApp.description: This message appears in the popup if the current site is not supported by the plugin
downloadDesktopApp.message: You can capture anything with the Oddshot Desktop app.

error.description: The title of notification about error

errorTakingShot.description: The content of notification shows when shot can't be taken
errorTakingShot.message: There has been an error taking the shot.

failedRetrievingShotData.description: Error message shows if the capture server reject our request

invalidMetaData.description: The content of notification about invalid meta data
invalidMetaData.message: We couldn't get enough information about this stream.

invalidMetaDataTitle.description: The title of notification when we couldn't get enough data

loadingStatus.description: Status message when stream is loading or initializing
loadingStatus.message: Stream is loading, please wait until it loads.

loadingStatusTitle.description: Status title when stream is loading or initializing

manyStreamsStatus.description: Status message when there are multiple sources on the same page.
manyStreamsStatus.message: Please use the video player capture button if there are multiple sources on the same page.

notLiveStatus.description: Status message when stream is not live
notLiveStatus.message: Stream must be live if you want to capture it.

notLiveStatusTitle.description: Status title when stream is not live

notReadyStatus.description: Status message when stream is not ready
notReadyStatus.message: Oddshot is not ready just yet, please wait a few more seconds.

notReadyStatusTitle.description: Status title when stream is not ready

oddshotSupports.description: Label shown in the popup, next to the supported sites icons

offlineStatus.description: Status message when stream is offline
offlineStatus.message: Stream is currently offline, try again later.

offlineStatusTitle.description: Status title when stream is offline

pageIsLoadingStatus.description: Status message when page is not fully loaded
pageIsLoadingStatus.message: The page is not fully loaded, please wait until it loads.

pageIsLoadingStatusTitle.description: Status title when page is not fully loaded

pageNotSupportedStatus.description: Status message when page is not supported
pageNotSupportedStatus.message: This page does not support taking shots.

pageNotSupportedStatusTitle.description: Status title when page is not supported

pausedStatus.description: Status message when stream is paused
pausedStatus.message: Stream is paused, resume it to capture the best moments.

pausedStatusTitle.description: Status title when stream is paused

popupGoBack.description: Link to go back in popup navigation (displayed in the report problem form)

popupReportFormSubmitButton.description: Value of the submit button that will send a report

popupReportFormSuccess.description: Message will be shown when report has been submitted
popupReportFormSuccess.message: Thanks for your report, we will look at it and try to fix it as soon as possible.

popupReportProblemLink.description: Link to the report problem form

protectedStatus.description: Status message when video is protected

protectedStatusTitle.description: Status title when video is protected

providerNotResponds.description: Notification title when provider API doesn't respond to our request.

readyExtendedStatus.description: Extended status message when stream is ready
readyExtendedStatus.message: "$1" is ready, click the 'Take shot' button to capture.

readyStatus.description: Status message when stream is ready
readyStatus.message: Oddshot is ready, click the 'Take shot' button to capture.

readyStatusTitle.description: Status title when stream is ready

unsupportedStatus.description: Status message when stream format is unsupported
unsupportedStatus.message: The format of this stream is not supported yet.

unsupportedStatusTitle.description: Status title when stream format is unsupported
